title: Social media
body:
1. Draft social media content. Consider Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and Reddit. Brainstorm and list out possible hashtags. 
2. Select appropriate images and write out appropriate ALT text. 
3. Get others to review content. 
4. Schedule social media w/ USGS Social Media team, see [my fake link](https://github.com/USGS-VIZLAB/example123/labels) 
5. Once released, watch social media and respond to questions or comments.

title: Create thumbnail
body: Create a thumbnail for the viz. Add path to viz.yaml. This will be used on the landing page and for social media.

title: Verify thumbnail specs
body: Check on thumbnail dimensions and rules through developer documentation in case it has changed. Update thumbnail and our documentation appropriately. For example, https://dev.twitter.com/cards/types/summary.

title: Identify related content
body: List what the related content for this viz should be. This can be other vizzies, blogs, or products. Then add to the footer.

title: Press release
body: Work with OCAP to draft a press release.
